main event: A witness reported seeing 12 lights in a 'V' formation near Amarillo, Texas on August 24, 1965. One of the objects remained stationary for about an hour before moving to the north.
interesting points: The objects moved in various directions except for one that remained stationary for about an hour.
The stationary object was believed to be a star and the apparent movement was due to autokinesis, or the illusion of movement caused by prolonged observation.
The other objects were believed to be part of a refueling operation by a KC-135 tanker and F-102 fighter jets from Cannon AFB.
No photographs were taken of the objects.
The witness was considered a reliable observer, but no definitive explanation was found for the sighting.
